main event: An unidentified object was observed in Hyattsville, Maryland on July 21, 1960.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 5 minutes., The object was described as varied in size and color., Witnesses noted the object resembled a falling meteor., Observers compared the size of the object to a 25-cent piece., The object fell straight down without any maneuvers.
witness description: Observers reported varying elevations of view of the object.
